1. 转文字频道，文件列表工作台视觉升级，支持显示内容关键词，核心信息快速把握，体验更佳。

1. Convert text channel to file list workbench visual upgrade, support display content keywords, quickly grasp core information for better experience.
2. During real-time transcription, support editing speaker information for quick correction during the meeting.
